Безопасно

При чистки, разогревают осадки в резервуаре локально по всему днищу, разогрев 5000 м³ происходит максимум за 7 суток, возврат углеводорода 3 суток, зачистка днища от мехпримесей 14 дней, что гарантирует выполнение работ в

Отзывы Подзаголовок

ОАО Татнефть, tatneft.ru

This letter of reference refers to the performance of the Crude Oil Tank TK-110 cleaning by ARKOIL Technologies Nederland B.V. (hereafter referred as ARKOIL) for BP Raffinaderij Rotterdam B.V. (hereafter referred as BP).

Генеральный директор, Петров С.А

Задача

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

ОАО Татнефть, tatneft.ru

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

О компании

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

Подробнее

География деятельности

We perform fast and high quality cleaning of tanks of all types and sizes at oil refineries, pumping stations, tank farms, oil terminals, power plants and boiler plants, including damaged tanks, as well as with damaged bottom, flooded pontoons and pontoons fallen to the bottom
